00038 void BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog::encode(uint8_t **buf_ptr) {
00039   uint8_t *base = *buf_ptr;
00040   BlockCompressionHeader::encode(buf_ptr);
00041   Serialization::encode_long(buf_ptr, m_timestamp);
00042   if ((size_t)(*buf_ptr - base) + 2 == length()) 
00043     write_header_checksum(base, buf_ptr);
00044 }

00047 int BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog::decode(uint8_t **buf_ptr, size_t *remaining_ptr) {
00048   uint8_t *base = *buf_ptr;
00049   int error;
00050 
00051   if ((error = BlockCompressionHeader::decode(buf_ptr, remaining_ptr)) != Error::OK)
00052     return error;
00053 
00054   if (!Serialization::decode_long(buf_ptr, remaining_ptr, &m_timestamp))
00055     return Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_TRUNCATED;
00056 
00057   if ((size_t)(*buf_ptr - base) == length() - 2) {
00058     *buf_ptr += 2;
00059     *remaining_ptr -= 2;
00060   }
00061   
00062   return Error::OK;
00063 }
